name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
description: Develops and implements intelligent systems that can perform tasks that typically require human intelligence, such as visual perception, speech recognition, and decision-making.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Provides on-demand access to a shared pool of computing resources, including servers, storage, and applications, over the internet.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Protects computer systems, networks, and sensitive data from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction.

name: Data Analytics and Science
description: Extracts insights and knowledge from structured and unstructured data to inform business decisions, improve operations, and drive innovation.

name: Database Management
description: Designs, implements, and manages databases to store, retrieve, and manipulate data efficiently and securely.

name: Internet of Things (IoT)
description: Connects and integrates physical devices, sensors, and systems to collect and exchange data, enabling smart environments and services.

name: Networking and Communications
description: Designs, implements, and manages computer networks, protocols, and communication systems to enable data exchange and collaboration.

name: Software as a Service (SaaS)
description: Provides software applications over the internet, eliminating the need for local installation, maintenance, and updates.

name: Telecommunications
description: Enables voice, data, and video communication services over wired and wireless networks, including fixed-line, mobile, and satellite communications.

name: Virtual and Augmented Reality
description: Creates immersive, interactive, and simulated environments to enhance entertainment, education, and business experiences.

name: Web Development and Design
description: Designs, builds, and maintains websites, web applications, and mobile applications to provide online presence and services.
